Welcome to Paymon! Send cry-cy during chatting! Create wallet and don’t worry about their safety! Change your cry-cy! Play with friends and be the best! And all these are convenient and fast! Use paymon and be free! Have a question? Check FAQ or write us! We are always ready to help.

Paymon for Android "version %1$d"
Your wallet was reset!
It will take some time to recover. You need to <u>back up your wallet</u>! Congratulations, you received your first payment! Have you already <u>backed up your wallet</u>, to protect against loss? Hint: to increase the safety of your wallet, you can <u>encrypt your device</u>. This also protects data of other apps. mined internal Filter All payments Received payments Sent payments Tip / donate Raise network fee Do you want to raise the network fee of this payment by %s? It will make the payment confirm quicker. Determining network fee… The network fee of this payment can't be raised. Decrypting… Done. Raise Add sending address Edit label of sending address Add label to your address Edit label of your address Address Label Save Network fee This transaction strengthens your wallet against theft. <u>More info.</u> This transaction raises the network fee for a previous payment. This payment has not been transmitted yet. This payment has been received directly. There is a risk it might never become spendable. The confirmation of this payment is delayed, likely due to an overload of the Bitcoin network. This payment should become spendable in a few minutes. This payment has an increased risk of being reversed by the sender! If you can, wait for confirmation. This payment has been reversed by the sender. This small amount can probably never be spent economically. This payment pays to many wallets besides yours, which makes the app slow down over time. If you can, try receiving payments which pay only to you. This payment was delayed because the sender used an insecure transaction type. Mining difficulty adjustment Mining reward halving just now Restore wallet You are about to replace your current wallet. Any coins in the current wallet will be lost unless you've got a separate backup of that. Important: Do not load private keys from dubious sources! Others can gain control over your funds if you do. Restore Wallet was restored. Your wallet was successfully restored. Its balance will be determined next. This will take some time. Wallet could not be restored: Bad password? Your backup will be encrypted with the chosen password and written to external storage. Your wallet is protected by a spending PIN. Make sure you remember the PIN in addition to the backup password!
Your wallet has been backed up to
If your device has a removable SD card, your backup should be on that card. Remove it and keep it at a safe place. 

If the card is not removable, you need to archive your backup to some other place than your device. 

If the only place your backup exists is on your device, you run the risk of losing both at the same time! In any case, make sure you remember your backup password. 

Do you want to archive your wallet now? Your wallet could not be backed up: %s Archive Paymon BTC Wallet backup The attached encrypted file contains Bitcoin private keys and should be kept safe at all times. Don't forget the encryption password! Archive wallet using… Archiving wallet failed. password Show password Error weak fair good strong Sorry The camera has a problem. You probably need to restart the device. Camera permission In order to scan QR codes, you need to grant permission to use the camera. Cannot read data:

%s Invalid Bitcoin URI:
%s Got invalid bitcoin address!
(Mixing up mainnet/testnet?) Cannot verify payment request:

%s Invalid transaction:
%s Share… issue description Report Append device information Append list of installed packages Append application log Append wallet dump Send report using… Sending report failed. Received %s %d peers connected You've still got Bitcoins on this device! Remember your balance of %s will be lost if you uninstall the Bitcoin Wallet app without sending it away first. If you don't care about your coins, you could also donate them to the Bitcoin Wallet project. Remind me later Don't remind me

15. Agreement
 
 Last updated: June 15, 2017
 
 The site mobile application and related services are provided by Paymon. You acknowledge that any use of this website, mobile applications and any use of our services is subject to these Terms of Service. You also understand that you are responsible for your own safety first. Do not give anyone your password and login.
 

1. General Provisions

1.1. We reserve the right to change these rules at any time at our discretion. Any available access to your access. If you provided us with your email address, we will notify you by email of changes in these conditions.

1.2. It is your responsibility, carefully read the conditions in each paragraph. Your continued use of the services means your consent to the conditions in this user agreement.
 
 2. Definitions
 
 2.1. All uses of "our", "we" means Paymon -

The Russian Federation has a registered address in Ekaterinburg city, house 29, office 508

2.2. All uses of "You", "Your" or "User" means a person or persons using the Paymon application or the website www.paymon.ru.

2.3. "Services" means any opportunity provided by us through a site or mobile application in any local application (personal computer or otherwise), including, without limitation, the services of a purse or data blockage, but excluding API services that are governed by a separate agreement.

2.4. Communication includes communication via e-mail, as well as through the built-in Paymon system.

2.5. "Force Majeure means any event outside the reasonable control of the system. Notepad and Paymon, not limited to, floods, extraordinary meteorological conditions, earthquakes or other natural disasters, fires, wars, insurrections, riots, labor disputes, accidents, government actions, communications, power failure or equipment or software malfunction.
 
 3. Right

3.1. If you use services on behalf of a legal entity, you also acknowledge and guarantee that: a legal entity is valid and it operates in accordance with the laws of jurisdiction and territorial restrictions of its country.

3.2 These terms and conditions and use of the Paymon website / mobile application and services are governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Russian Federation. The dispute that arises with the challenge of these conditions, or with the use of the site / mobile application will be decided exclusively in the court of the Russian Federation
 
 4. Privacy and Security Policy

4.1. Please see our privacy policy. In the section "Privacy Policy"

4.2. We try to take all reasonable measures to protect your personal information. However, we can not guarantee the security of the information you provide online. You accept inherent security risks, provision of information and communication on the Internet and will not hold us responsible for any breach of security if it is related to our negligence.
 
 5. Acceptance of risk, limitation of liability and compensation

5.1. You agree and acknowledge that there are risks associated with using the Bitcoin Internet-purse, including the risk of equipment failure, the risk of software and Internet connection failure, the risk of the parties to malicious programs, and the risk that third parties may receive Unauthorized access to information stored in your Wallet. You agree and acknowledge that Paymon will not be liable for any communication failures, failures, errors, distortions or delays in transactions.

5.2. We will not be liable for any losses and are not responsible for any misuse of our services, including:

5.2.1 User errors, such as passwords, incorrectly created transactions, or Bitcoin address errors;

5.2.2. Server failure or data loss;

5.2.3. Unauthorized access to applications;

5.2.4. Any unauthorized actions of third parties, including without limitation the use of viruses, phishing, bruteforce or other means of attacking the site or services.

5.3. We do not give any guarantees that the site or server will work smoothly, or that the defects will be corrected. We will not be held responsible for any losses of any kind.
 /n 6. Responsibility for communication with Paymon with third parties

6.1. Using our service, you can view the content or use of services provided by third parties, including links to web pages and the services of such persons ("third party materials"). We do not approve or accept any third-party content and assume no responsibility for Third-Party Content, including, without limitation, materials that may mislead, offend you. In addition, your relationship or correspondence with third parties exclusively between you and third parties. We are not responsible for any loss or damage of any kind incurred as a result of

such a relationship, and you understand that your interactions with third parties are at your own risk.
 
 7.Creating a wallet

7.1. You do not need to use a blockchain wallet. At the time of registration at Paymon, a purse is registered for you and a unique number is assigned.

7.2. We recommend that you do not skip the step of entering an additional password and be sure to enter it, this will protect you if the phone is stolen or the system is compromised.

7.3. When you attach third-party wallets, we strongly recommend using wallets to which you have full confidence, in case of loss of funds from third-party purses Paymon administration does not bear responsibility.

7.4. You agree and acknowledge that you assume responsibility for all actions that occur under the control of your purse and accept all risks of any authorized or unauthorized access to your wallet, to the fullest extent permitted by law.
 
 8. Paymon Services

8.1. The creation and storage of crypt-purse addresses and encrypted private keys are stored on the local device and, if possible, you can provide protection through the means of Paymon servers, this facilitates the transfer of data on transactions in the network bitcoin and others and does not require downloading or installing associated with network software.

8.2. When you create a purse, the Creation and Storage of cryptographic passwords immediately encrypt your wallet, the data that is used to send and receive bitcoins and other crypto-currencies through the bitcoin network and through the Paymon network are encrypted and maximally protected. The Private Key uniquely coincides

with the address of the Wallet and should be used to transfer the Crypto-currency.

8.3. You are solely responsible for ensuring the security of your private key and backup. You must keep your Wallet address, backup and private key secure. Failure to do so may result in the loss of control of crypto-currencies tied to the wallet.

8.3. Paymon does not receive or store your wallet and password, nor unencrypted keys and addresses. Therefore, we can not help you with the recovery of your wallet and password recovery. Our services provide you with tools to help you remember or recover the password, including the ability to set password hints, but the services can not create a new password for your wallet. You are solely responsible for remembering your wallet password. Paymon can provide and help you with the loss of your password and restore it if you have made the maximum level of protection and provided us with your data.

8.4. In order for the transaction to be completed, all offered Bitcoin-transactions, etc. Must be confirmed and registered in the Block System. Bitcoin Network, etc. Is managed by a decentralized network of independent third parties. Blocking does not have control over the bitcoin network and therefore can not provide a guarantee that any details of the transaction will be confirmed through the Bitcoin Network. You acknowledge and agree that the details of the transaction you transfer through the services of Paymon products which are based on the BlockChain system and any of your transactions may not be completed, or may be significantly delayed by the Bitcoin network.

8.5. Storage and transfer of Bitcoins and other crypto-currencies. Is an intangible, digital asset. They exist only because of the responsibility and demand of users of the bitcoin network, etc.

8.6. Any transfer of property rights, which may lead to the failure of the transfer of the Crypto-currency, and the failure to write a decentralized book is prohibited. We do not guarantee that the service can transfer ownership rights or the right to manage crypto-currency transactions.

8.7. Under the present conditions, the creation of partnerships, joint ventures, agencies or guardianships is prohibited, you and Blockchain are independent contractors in relation to each other.
 8.8. You represent and warrant that any information you provide through the services is accurate and complete. You agree and acknowledge that Blockchine is not responsible for any errors or omissions that you make from any purse and various crypto-currencies initiated through Paymon's services, for example, if you sealed in the Wallet Address or otherwise provided incorrect information. We strongly recommend that you carefully study all details of the transaction before completing them through the Paymon Services.
 8.9. No cancellations or changes. After the details of the transaction were submitted to the Paymon network and the blockchain system, we can not help you to cancel the transactions or otherwise change your transaction details. Blocker does not control Bitcoin Networks and other crypto-currencies and is not able to facilitate any cancellation or change of request.
 
 9. The Commission
 9.1. Paymon creates a purse for free. The block system currently charges a small portion of the transactions, but we reserve the right to do so in the future, in which case any fees will be displayed before you use any service in which fees may be charged.

9.2. Mining Bitcoins and other crypto-currencies. The system of mining has nothing to do with Paymon products, we just facilitate the translation and conversion of crypto currency.
 
 10. Termination of services
 10.1. We can, at our discretion and without cost to you, "with" or "without" prior notice and at any time modify or terminate, temporarily or permanently, any part of our services. You are solely responsible for storing and backing up any address purse and private key.
 10.2. We can suspend or terminate your access to the services at your discretion, immediately and without prior notice, and also delete or deactivate your wallet and all associated information and files.
 
 11. Restrictions
 11.1. By accessing and using Paymon's services, you agree that you will not commit any unlawful acts and that you are fully responsible for your actions when using our services. Without limiting the general meaning of the foregoing, you acknowledge that you will not:
 11.1.1. Use our services in any way that may interfere, disrupt, adversely affect or prevent other users from fully utilizing our services, or that may damage, disable, overload or disrupt the operation of our service;
 11.1.2. Use Paymon's services to pay, support, or otherwise participate in any illegal activity, including fraud, money laundering, or terrorist activities, as well as other activities prohibited by law in the jurisdiction of which you are located.
 11.1.3. Use or attempt to use someone else's Wallet without authorization;
 11.1.4. Attempt to bypass any methods of filtering the Content that we use, or attempt to access any service or area of ​​our services;
 11.1.5. Distribute the services of any viruses, Trojans, worms, logical bombs or other harmful materials;
 11.1.6. Develop any third-party applications that interact with our services without our prior written consent;
 11.1.7. Provide false, inaccurate or misleading information;
 11.1.8. Encourage or encourage third parties to participate in any activity is prohibited in this section.
 
 12. Intellectual Property Rights
 12.1. Unless otherwise indicated, and all intellectual property rights on the website and any content provided in connection with our services are the property of Paymon or our licensors and suppliers and are protected by applicable intellectual property laws. We do not give any licenses for the use and content of the site and mobile application.
 12.2. You accept and acknowledge that the materials contained on the website and the mobile application are provided for your personal, legal, non-commercial use. You further
 acknowledge that any other use of materials from the site is strictly prohibited and you agree with this wording.
 12.3. You agree to retain all copyrights and other notices of ownership contained in the material, and the content of the site and the mobile application.
 12.4. You can not sell or modify site material or reproduce, display, publicly distribute or otherwise use the materials for any public or commercial purpose. Use of materials on other sites or on file sharing services or similar services for any purpose is prohibited.
 12.5. You can not copy any material or content contained on the site and in the mobile application without our prior written permission. Any rights not granted by us to use the material contained on the site belong to Paymon in full.


 13. Feedback
 13.1. We welcome any comments and comments on your part, and also need new ideas for improving the work of Paymon services. All your feedback can be sent through the feedback form on the site or through mobile applications, as well as sending an email to the mail: press@paymon.ru

 
 14. The form of the majeure

14.1. If, due to any force majeure circumstances, you or the Block Account system is delayed or prevents your actions, such delay or non-performance shall not be considered a violation of these Terms.
 
 15. Agreement
 15.1. These terms represent the entire agreement between you and Paymon. These conditions cancel and replace all previous agreements and agreements between you and Paymon and the Block System. You can not transfer your rights or obligations under these conditions without prior written consent.
 
 Sincerely, Paymon Administration.


 1. General Provisions 

2. Terms of use of the web - site and mobile application 

3. Measures to protect information about Users 

4. Data deletion 

5. Information processing Paymon

6. Rights and duties of users

7. Restrictions on the operation of the rules

8. Feedback
 

1. General Provisions

Using a mobile application or website, you agree to this policy. Paymon reserves the right to change this policy at any time. Any changes will be published, so that you always knew what information we collect, how we use it and under what circumstances we disclose it.

1.1. These Rules are an official document of Paymon Limited Liability Company located at 25 Malysheva Street, Ekaterinburg, office 508, (hereinafter referred to as the Site Administration), and determine the procedure for processing and protecting information on individuals using services Internet site http://paymon.ru/ and mobile application Paymon.

1.2. The purpose of these Rules is to ensure proper protection of information about users, including their personal data, from unauthorized access and disclosure.

1.3. Relationships related to the collection, storage, dissemination and protection of information about users of the Site and the mobile application are governed by these Rules, other official documents of the Site Administration and the current legislation of the Russian Federation.

1.4. These Terms can be changed by Paymon company without any special notification, the new version of the Terms comes into force from the moment of its posting on the Internet at the address indicated in this paragraph, unless otherwise provided for in the new edition of the Terms. The current version of the Terms is always on the page at the address: http://Paymon.ru 

1.5. These Rules are developed and used in accordance with the Terms of Use of the site paymon.ru and mobile application Paymon. If there are contradictions between these Rules and other official documents of the Site Administration and mobile application, these Rules shall apply.

1.7. In case of disagreement of the User with the terms of these Rules, the use of the Site and Paymon services should be immediately terminated.

1.8. If Paymon has made any changes to these terms with which the User does not agree, he must stop using the Service.

1.9. All the existing functions of the Service, as well as any development of them or the addition of new ones, are the subject of these Terms.
 
 2. Terms of use of the Site and mobile application

2.1. Providing services for the use of the Sit/e, the mobile application and its services (hereinafter referred to as the Site and mobile application services), the Site Administration, acting reasonably and in good faith, believes that the User:

- Has all the necessary rights that allow him to register and use this Website and mobile application;

- Indicates reliable information about yourself in the amounts required to use the Mobile Application annd Site Services
-Considers that certain types of information transferred to other Users can not be deleted by the User;

-I am acquainted with these Rules, expresses my agreement with them and assumes the rights and duties indicated in them.

2.2. The Administration of the Site does not verify the reliability of the received (collected) information about users, except for cases when such verification is necessary in order to fulfill the obligations of the Site Administration to the user.

2.3. The data provided to Paymon are kept in accordance with applicable law in safe places. Paymon has ensured that the relevant security standards are safe, confidential and secure. Regarding the subjects of the data users of the site and mobile applications, Paymon, where required, is registered with the relevant national data protection / information protection authorities. Paymon also guarantees that the data is stored in accordance with the requirements of the national legislation of the state.
 
 3. Measures to protect information about Users

3.1. The Administration of the Site and mobile application takes technical and organizational and legal measures to ensure the protection of the User's personal data from unauthorized or accidental access to them, destruction, modification, blocking, copying, distribution, as well as other illegal actions.

3.2. To authorize access to the Site, the login (e-mail address or entered data at registration) and the User's password are used. The User is responsible for the safety of this information. The user does not have the right to transfer their own login and password to third parties, and also must take measures to ensure their confidentiality.

3.3. In order to provide more reliable protection of information about Users, the Administration of the Site uses the system of page binding to the mailing address. User in case of loss of login or password can restore access to the page by contacting technical support and filling out the form on the site www.paymon.ru/. In order to reduce the likelihood of use by third parties of these Users and to send spam from their names. If the user's login and password are entered using an unusual server for the User (in particular, a foreign country server), the Site Administration can block the entry to the User's personal page. Access occurs by means of the message on earlier specified mail box with the requirement to confirm an input. User. After confirmation, access to Paymon 3.4 services is provided. The user has the right to receive information about when and from which devices authorization was made to his personal page, by requesting technical support.
 
 4.Data deletion

4.1 If you want to delete your account, please go to your profile: Settings - account management - delete profile - enter password. Deleting an account will delete all messages, groups and contacts.

4.2 When you delete a message from the history, it still remains on the server - in the history of the messages of your interlocutor. When he also removes it from history, it will retire forever.

The motto of Paymon - be free, so we value the freedom of communication.

4.3 When you delete personal data (other user information) from the User's personal page or delete the User's personal page from the Site or mobile application, information about the User copied by other Users or stored on the pages of other Users is saved.
 
 5. Information processing Paymon

5.1. Storage and use of personal data

Personal data of users are stored exclusively in electronic media and processed using automated systems, except for cases when manual processing of personal data is necessary in connection with the implementation of legal requirements.

5.2. Transfer of personal data

Personal data of Users is not transferred to any third parties, except for the cases directly provided by these Rules.

When specifying the user or with the consent of the user, it is possible to transfer the user's personal data to a third user.

Granting of personal data of Users at the request of state bodies (local self-government bodies) is carried out according to the procedure provided by legislation at the place of registration of Paymon.

In order to execute the agreement between the User and

5.3. By posting information on a personal page, including his personal data, the User is aware and agrees that the specified information may be available to other Internet users taking into account the architecture and functionality of the mobile application. The user himself determines the privacy mode and conditions for access to information. The Administration of the Site takes technical and organizational measures to ensure the functioning of the relevant tools of the Site and the mobile application.

5.4. Personal information Paymon handles for the following purposes:

5.4.1 Identifying the party within the Services, agreements and contracts with Paymon;

5.4.2 Provision of Personalized Services to the User and execution of agreements and contracts;

5.4.3 Communication with the User, including sending notifications, requests and information regarding the use of the Services, the execution of agreements and contracts, and the processing of requests and applications from the User;

5.4.4 Improvement of the quality of Services, ease of use, development of new Services;

5.4.5 Carrying out statistical and other studies based on impersonal data.
 
 6. Rights and duties of users

6.1. Users are entitled to:

6.1.1. To provide free and free access to information about yourself using a username and password;

6.1.2. Independently make changes and corrections to information about yourself on the User's personal page on the Site and mobile application, provided that such changes and corrections contain up-to-date and reliable information;

6.1.3. Delete information about yourself from your personal page in the mobile application;

6.1.4. Require the Paymon Administration to clarify its personal data, block it or destroy it if such data are incomplete, outdated, unreliable, illegally obtained or are not necessary for the stated purpose of processing and if it is impossible to carry out the actions independently;

6.1.5. Based on the request to receive information from the Site Administration concerning the processing of his personal data.
 
 7. Limitation of the rules.

7.1. Paymon has the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy. When making changes to the current version, the date of the last update is indicated. The new version of the Policy comes into force from the moment of its placement.

7.2. To this Policy and the relationship between the User and Paymon's services arising in connection with the application of the Privacy Policy, the law of the Russian Federation is applicable.

7.3. The present Rules do not apply to actions and Internet resources of third parties.

7.4 The administration of Paymon is not responsible for the actions of third parties who, as a result of using the Services of the Site or the mobile application, have access to information about the User. The Site Administration recommends that Users take a responsible approach to the issue of the amount of information about themselves placed in Paymon.
 
 8.Feedback

Any questions about this policy, the collection, use and disclosure of personal data Blocking or access to your personal data that are required by law and information subject to disclosure should be sent to press@paymon.ru .

Transaction history is empty Exchange rates ICO Learn more White paper We greet you! Paymon is a blockchain platform of a new generation. The main goal of our project is to create a blockchain-ecosystem, where each user can satisfy all his needs, from the purchase of crypto currency, ending with the payment for any goods in any store. Hive "Our cryptocurrency will be based on Directed Acyclic Graph which we call “Hive”. This technology will let you make transactions without any fees or large delays in confirmation. " Profit – platform for business, where every owner of business can receive payment for his goods or services in cryptocurrency. The main goal of ICO is the distribution of tokens, which will be used on our platform and work on Hive technology.
